Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.ModelMessages

Class OwnWhisperMessage

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.ModelMessages.ModelMessage
SoftEng_2024.Model.ModelMessages.OwnWhisperMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OwnWhisperMessage extends ModelMessage
OwnWhisperMessage class represents a specific type of ModelMessage used for indicating a whisper message sent by the local user.

This class extends ModelMessage and overrides the executeMessage method to add the own whisper message to the chat of a specified view's local model.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • OwnWhisperMessage

      public OwnWhisperMessage(double ID, String message, String whisperedNickname, String time)
      Constructs an OwnWhisperMessage with a receiver ID, message content, whispered nickname, and the time of the whisper.
      Parameters:
      ID - The receiver's ID to whom the message is intended.
      message - The content of the whisper message.
      whisperedNickname - The nickname of the recipient of the whisper.
      time - The time at which the whisper message was sent.

      Executes the own whisper message by formatting it with the time and sender information, then adding it to the chat of the specified view's local model.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      view - The view on which to execute the own whisper message.
